objs.desc: Hold each obj candidate to be culled and rendered

visible_objs.desc: Hold each obj which has been culled

prefabs.desc: Array of Prefabs. Each prefabs defines which draw calls must be rendered

draw_datas.desc: Holds how many objs of each type have passes the culling test

TCtes.desc: Notify the CS how many instances must handle

TCullingPlanes.desc: Planes to perform the culling test
